title: Light Hammers
content:
ight Hammers also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Light Hammers have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Light Hammers in BG3. This Weapon Action is Concussive Smash.
